title: New: Yoste – Arc
body:
Is it too early to start thinking about summer playlists? Probably, but these long, cold nights are really weighing me down, so what the hell.

This latest track from Brisbane’s **Yoste** is a surefire inclusion, lifted from his debut EP expected later this year, _Arc_, is a super slick composition. A lovelorn pop song at heart, it’s undeniably current and hopefully an indicator of plenty more to come this year. Check it out below.
